text:
Lol our interactions were betraying each other in crypto group. Forget that lol. 
I like you ab because maine suna tune bhand hoke Mishra ki maar li poora din. üòõ
All the best :)
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text: I was gonna write a memoir but then realized it‚Äôs already your bio. Ranting sessions were fun though. Ek chiz bachi thi vo bhi last din karli :)). Poore time bhale hi chutiya bola ho par tu itna bhi nai hai xD
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
Kitne plans banae hai yaar tere saath, kaafi excited rehta tha tu harr chiz ke liye and sirf uski karan ki successful ho paate the unme se 25% lol. First year mein kaafi tharki samajhti thi tujhe, abhi bhi koi khaas accha nai samajhti hoonüòÇ par I love you a lot.  Yaad hai nashe mein kuch bhi bolte rehte the apan and kitne faaltu promises. Mere paas teri video hai promise ki ki tu milne aaega pakke se.  Jaob kahin bhi lagi, saal ki ek trip pakki. Ye faaltu vaala promise nai hai, I really mean it.  Mai kitni baar hall2 vaale room aati thi par tu kaafi comfortable tha usse (swapnil to gaand fati mein hi rehta tha poore timeüòÖ). Bohot maze kiye apan ne us room mein, kitni acchi memories. Tere kuuch embarrassing videos bhi hai mere paas(hints are: lip gloss and yellow). Nai milne aaya to leak kar dungi.  Bohot sad thi mai jab tu jaa raha tha Kanpur se last month. Honestly maine and Anany ne bhi tab hi jaane ka plan bana liya tha.  RM mein sasti daaru ka alag hi feel hai, kya pata baad mein utna maza ho na ho. 
Tu hamesha Gupta kaaju hi rahega üíô
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
Tu kaafi time campus mein nai raha but I remember our weird and awkward interactions Esha ke room pe lol. RM vaale were good. Mujhe tu itna seedha lagta tha first year mein that I was like "ye banda date kar raha hai? üòõ".  Chaapu hai tu, isiliye apni zyada nai baat ho paayiüòÖ
Best.
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text: Apan dono Indore se hai same coaching, tu mere ghar se 300m pe rehta hai, 2 baar Kanpur jaane ke plans ban chuke saath mein fir bhi apni baat sirf drams mein hi sabse zyada hui. üòÖUske baad kuch random book reviews. I hope to see you more ab :)
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text: Mera bina mann hi nai lagta tera ki piche piche Hyderabad bhi aa gaya. Sorry tere pati Anany ka time lene ke liye üòõChal milte hai job mein. Bach ke rehna
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
The best memory I have of you is when we ate Ayush's nutella on his birthday. Also, Mango was really good.
PS: You are great but don't you ever try to steal my food xD.
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
Hii, 
We have had a very little interaction in our first year but thanks for helping me in first year academics. 
Good luck for your future :)
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
CRINGE ALERT!!
It started with scaring other couples on the skywalk and ended with, NO, it never ended :). You can never imagine how much you meant to me at the time we met. You still have no idea how precious those late-night walks were, how beautiful the sun looked at 5 am with you, how you just understood what I meant, how you just knew what to say at every fucking time, how you always kept my priorities at top, how you never really complained about anything, how you made me laugh even if it wasn‚Äôt necessary. I know everything you did required patience and dedication, I know it wasn‚Äôt easy for you to get out of your comfort zone but there wasn‚Äôt even one single time when you backed out. You are the most rational boyfriend one could expect. Even when we were fighting, you were there for me. Many of the things can not be written here but I know you'll always feel them while reading this. I do and always will appreciate those little things, our walks on "footpaths" both inside and outside campus, our first date in bazooka, sneaking through moti jheel barricades, the gatecrash in Kanpur, binging tv series, our spot(wink) and infinite other things. I know I can get too competitive and sometimes it can be difficult but you never uttered a word. I am extremely happy for us to have crossed many challenges that came in our relationship. It was as close to ideal as WE could get. We had our quirks and weirdness. I like having really conversations with you, I love sharing the "we could go to jail for this" humor with you. I love that you typed my pet name exactly 69 times in my memoir. I love a million things about you and I can fill pages but can not. You'll know them. I just want to say one thing, there may be a thousand ways in which a relationship MAY or may NOT go, but I know we'll choose what will work best for us. LOVE YOU MOTU üñ§

PS:  Even if we decide to break up, I REALLY hope our friendship stays this magical. :)
author: Gunjan  Jalori

Your memoir is a tricky one to write, jab bhi baat hui ladai ho jaati thiüòÇ. Par unse life thodi happening rehti thi campus mein xD.  I would like to say thanks for being born on 6th July, I would've given a treat for that campus mein. You are a very sweet personality and I wish I had figured it out sooner. Board games expert hai tu and sikhate rehna naye games, kaafi maza aata hai. 
Bhopal mein milne ke plans reh hi gaye :(

text:
Hii Ojha, 
Until second year mai tujhe us naam se jaanti thi, "jo chaapal hug karke so gaya tha." Fir pehle baar jab dekha tab bhi tu KD mein so raha tha, I didn‚Äôt know ki padhne mein bhi chaapu hai.  Thanks for Anaichas vaali treat though. Is baar mera lighter mat churana, and please vo RM floors vaali thing firse karte hai na. Also daaru ka taste better lagta hai RM mein :)

That time was lit apni walks kaafi lambi and saath mein yaad hai kd ke dabbe pe movies (znmd xD). Kuch dinner plans execute ho gaye but kaafi saare reh bhi gaye. 
But if we meet, is baar we'll try to have all the fun! 
PS: I love lambe baal.

text:
Hey Anshika,
You were a really great roommate, sorry for blaming all the food-stealing on you xD. You‚Äôve helped me a million times:). Also, I really like your dressing sense (except for footwear, yes I am talking about that chappalüòÇ), thanks for lending me your clothes whenever I felt like it.
I am glad we wiped the slate clean,  even when we were fighting I had respect for you which you‚Äôve earned fair and square. I hope we stay good friends in life and I am waiting for that trip btw.
Love you loads ü§ç

text: J. Randi
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
Hii Jay. R. 

I will always spell your name wrong. I will always end it with an R and always call you each of those "not at all offensive" words :). Kitna bhi rr karle tu, I will always tease you for what you "have" and "do not have." Because I have full Faith in our friendship (üòâ).

When we first met, I didn't know what was going on under the hood, and I guess neither did you. You started a streak for my birthdays. Jab mujhe Mudreka ne bola ki poem likh raha hai tu, I thought vo mock kar raha hai meko.  I hope that trend never ends. I always loved your gifts, kaafi efforts bhare hote the unme. I felt a different beautiful connection with you. Gh ke saamne vaali net ke paas jo hum baithe the, vo night hi best lagti hai mujhe aaj tak, that was the first time you kinda opened up. 

Uske baad to walks exponentially hi badh gayi, kaafi campus naap liya humne. I learned a lot un walks pe and I know you did too. Kitna fattu hai tu yaar. Green vaali night mein tune hi concepts batae the and teri hi fat gayiüòÇ.  Kaafi saari baate aisi hai jo likhi nai jaa sakti and shayad likh ke unki importance kam ho jaegi par you still have a special place in my life which will remain reserved for you

Even though our interactions got limited. I am glad to still have that near-perfect connection every time we talk. I know agar apan 10 saal ke baad bhi baat karenge to bhi I can make infi fun of you. Vaise tujhe apni deal yaad hai na? Bhulna mat vo. :)

Lots of loveüñ§
PS: I still think Bezaubernd doesn't suit me xD

Hii, first of all, congrats!!
We spent a lot of time in CCD and even more than that in MTH course classes lol, at one time I thought you were going to change your branch. I remember you said that you find lungi very comfy but won‚Äôt wear it in classes xD. You are the only person who showers 2-3 times a day in an Engineering college. But keep it up and all the best :)
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
"Ugh, I hate Atharv, nai par dost accha hai"- I never got tired of repeating this dialogue earlier. I was honestly a fan of our bittersweet friendship. Kyun laane hote the mujhse zyada marks?üò°Aaj you are OBVIOUSLY one of my best friends but back then we were amazing enemies, I still miss those times a bit, but I love what we have. I know for a fact that I can always count on you. I will miss calling you at random times and saying, "Atharv free hai??", "aaja niche", "marks kitne??". I will miss seeing you in class everyday (literally everyday). Tere karan jealousy mein mai bhi aane lagi this lol. I still can not believe ki tu kitna kam campus ghooma hai. Teri 1-2 treats still pending hai acchi vaali for you know what, campus vaali choti doesn‚Äôt count,xD. I never thought ki out of all tu (jo itna jealous tha mujhse, accha thike mai bhi thiüò§)  help karega meri placements mein. But, thanksüíô. Touch mein rehna varna kisi din hockey stick leke aaungi there ghar. Apan milenge obviously for a million things jo pending hai. I know to kaafi aage jaega life mein and this time I'll be proud of you. 
Kaafi sweet hai tu, no literally, you are a gem. Faaltu socha mat kar, maze kar and stay this amazing as always. TC
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text: Chal walk pe chalte hai?
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
hii,
I "officially" forgive you for that accident.üòÇ Faaltu mein hi paagal ho gaya tha tu, kuch kiya bhi nai tha tuneüòÇ. I am glad mujhe treat mil gayi xD
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
Avaniiii, 
5th sem mein tere room jaane ki itni aadat ho gayi thi ki 1-2 baar to mai apna room samajhke chali gayi fir kachra dekhke yaad aa jaata tha ki mera nai hai lol. Tu bhi OBVIOUSLY best roommate thi and iske kaafi reasons hai but my fav is ki tere paas hamesha khaana hota tha and tu khaa nai paati thi xD. Par seriously you are the one person who is always so fucking kind that it made me crazy ki koi itna sweet kaise ho sakta hai. Tujhe yaad hai apan exams mein bhi ghanto baat karte rehte the room pe fir realize hota tha fuck padhna hai. Kaafi accha lagta tha jab tu especially mere liye ghar se cookies and kaju katli laati thi. Kaafi caring hai tu and thanks for covid vaala time. I could count on you. I really love you so much and am super glad ki sab sahi ho gaya vapas apne beech. 
Goa ki acchi trip hogi ek pakke se
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
Aur mote,
This is how our every conversation started in campus. From "kabhi sutta nai lenge" to "chhodna hai yaar", we grew a lot. Kaafi cache friends banke aaye the apan and college ke pehle din bhi mai tujhse hi mili thi. Indore ka Aviral and campus vaala Aviral kaafi alag lagte hai and I still don‚Äôt know which one I like better. 

First year ki to countless acchi memories hai, the fight, walks and nightouts, exams mein bakchodi, library and ncl labs(I don‚Äôt know ye acchi hai ya nai) par isse definitely friendship to strong hui hai. Yaad hai there ghar pe monopoly khela tha apan ne. Mujhe digital version itna pasand aaya tha ki maine bhi order kar liya lol.
 Jo bhi kuch downs aaye unko bhool jaa. Apan abhi bhi Indore mein kaafi maze karenge. Ant bhala to ab bhalaüòÇ
Many years of friendship ahead.üíô
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
How do you define a friendship between girls?  I would say that you are the perfect living embodiment of that. You are everything one looks in a friend. You are kind, understanding, knows what to say, and you are just charming, to top it all off. 

Avisha, writing this memoir is difficult for me because you earned too many adjectives for you, but listing them may make this memoir look cliche or maybe fake, and I don't wanna do that. I also won't detail our memories here because I know there are many, and they are beautiful. Writing some of those here won't do justice to the others.

Yes, I opened up to you in second-year summers, and a partial reason was what I confessed at the rooftop. That night was exceptional for me because you made sure I knew that you won't judge me. You have always been a good listener and helped me through my worst of times in college.  I wish I could say that most people don't deserve your friendship, but I think that would be selfish. 

Your love for strange things always amazed me because it reflects that you could notice things other people can't, which is why people love you. Sometimes I may have not reacted as I should have, but that may be because I was jealous of the people getting close to you. But thank you for being such a good listener and for finally making me realize that you've got my back.

I hope we can meet again on our trip. Till then, farewell, amigo!
Loveüíô
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
When I look back at the dandiya night of our second year, I saw a cake in someone's hand and the person said "Ayush ka birthday hai, aaja upper crust ka cake hai üòÖ". I am so glad that I love free cake and Nutella. Lemme spill out some more cringe for you, you are obviously a remarkable person, but more importantly, you know how to be a REAL friend. You helped me a countless number of times in my whole college life. There were many instances when I was like, "chill hai, Ayush hai". Be it any course or need for a partner in crime, you were there. 

You understood my dark humor that most campus junta couldn't (tujhe bhi poora nai samajh aata tha, but I can work with that). You could sometimes (SOMETIMES) read my expressions and would warn me to use a filter. The list goes on and on. I most liked that you are a great secret keeper and try not to show your judgments (judge sab karte hai obviously). You always had a good movie, bean bag and snacks in your room (or I added in your canteen account :p). You always made my birthdays super special(when you didn‚Äôt forget) and thanks for the cookies, next time it is your duty to bring double the amount of the same cookies. And, I think this goes without saying that treats are always on you for the rest of our lives xD

The moments we spent meant a great deal to me, dinners, treats, walks (especially at 6am), rooftops, classes, LHC, photoshoots(remember second year ke end vaala :)). I'll miss you a lot, seriously, especially when I'll be drinking a super expensive scotch from my personal bar or when I'll see a sports car passing by. I'll miss our cycling trips with your choice of music and my choice of path.

This being said, don't ever think that I will stop making fun of you. You will always be "chaar baal ka taqla" or "Brag-queen" for me. A guy(?) with bubble-gummy shoes, whom I convinced to ditch a porn-set university.

Love,
Devil

PS: Don‚Äôt send me links, I‚Äôll never open them!
PPS: Good luck, you deserve UCB, thank god you didn‚Äôt decide for Lovely Professional University lol.
author: Gunjan  Jalori

author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
You are still on my list of people I wanna torture but don't worry about that. Till then, here goes your memoir.

In our first year, I remembered you as "vo jo vox ki treat.baant raha tha", or so I was told. Even then, I found you one of the most sensible guys from just a couple of interactions. This attribute of yours hasn't changed a bit, but the whole list needs way more pages. 

I've awarded you with many titles along the way 
like "blue earphones vaala(I didn't call them earphones obviously )," "prank partner," and whatnot. But whenever anyone asks me about you, I may say that he is the one person who will take responsibility for his actions, who has principles and is passionate about his views and opinions(I admire that so much about you btw). And despite all these descriptions are accurate, what I'll really want to say is that Kushagra is a feeling. He is an experience that can not be described; one would have to water the friendship enough for the greener grass to grow (Flowers are ugly). 

I respect you an insane amount for who you are and how you've become what you are. You are one hell of a loyal friend, and I know I can always count on you. I know my secrets are undoubtedly safe with you. The talk we had that afternoon was difficult for me too, but you made that a unicorn ride. You can expect the same amount of loyalty from my side because it is a two-way street, and I'll be happy to wave at you while crossing. The truth is you didn't pick up the phone that day; I called you first <3. 

When we first met, I thought we'd never click because you were a snob, and so was I, and yet it matured with listening to my never-ending talks to a hand on my shoulder with the words "I am here for you." So here's an ode to our non-judgemental friendship.

Love you loads <3
PS: I am crafting a new weapon to kill you xD
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
Bro tu kaafi sahi hai,b
Yaad hai pehla interaction "pencil" se chaalu hua tha, Yaad hai Simral vaali treat in Bazooka usme kaafi maza aaya tha. Anyway tu kaafi sweet hai and aisi hi rehna <3

text:
Hii Aunty,
Vaise to mai nai likh paati zyada par I can write books for you. Memoir likhna fir bhi tough hai kyuki bohot bhasad hai likhne ko dimag mein jise usually tu hi organize karti thi. My advice to all: Agar Medha ko sirf 25 percent bhi follow kar liya na to poori college life optimize ho jaegi. Kaafi chaapu hai tu aise hi rehna.

Ab sun, kyuki life mein sirf ek hi baar bolungi, you are the sweetest, kindest and PUREST person on this whole fucking planet. Pehli baar drying area ki bench pe mile the and ghanto baat karte rahe the, poore possible topics cover kar liye the us din, Fiitjee, Meerut, ex, KGP and blahhh. College life bhi humne usi tarah usi jagah baithkar end ki, usse better nai ho sakta tha last day apna. Bhale hi GALTI se tujhe itna door room de diya ho par vo kabhi bhi reason nai raha mere na aane ka. Tera room apne jaisa lagne laga tha. Kahi se bhi aati thi to pehle D731 mein aati thi. Sorry(nope) for 11:30pm things. You are the reason I don‚Äôt hate lockdown. Kisi bhi time pe no time limit vaale calls, millie/coco ke videos, VCs and many other things you did for me. Jab tujhe Bye karke upar aayi thi tab tera room dekhke realize hua ki it will never be the same. Kaafi time tak tere room ke lock ko stare kar rahi thi, hall office vaala tha na ki jo maine lagaya tha second-year ki summers mein. Tab pata chala firse ki ‚Äúit‚Äôs not the place, but people‚Äù. And I got the best peopleüñ§. Haan teri baat kar rahi hoon gawar. You know my deep deep deepest secrets jo mai kisi ko batane ka soch bhi nai sakti. You see through me like your white kurta(I love that btw).  Tu hadd special hai mere liye jitna tu soch bhi nai sakti. Poori Stats tune and tere notes ne padhai hai mujhe and seriously mere grades improvement ke credits bhi tujhe hi jaate hai. I survived on this campus because of you. 

Mai literally kaafi kuch aur likh sakti hoon tere baaare mein par kahin to rukna padhega. Bina mile US gayi to mai kabhi baat nai karungi. I find this word super lame but you are lamer, so here, ‚Äúbestie‚Äù. Always be my 2 AM buddy. I love you so much that I can share my food with youüñ§
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text: First year mein kaafi maze kiye hai group mein, Allen ki baate, canteen gossips, library night outs, hall 12 mein masti, group treats and aur bhi kaafi kuch.  I hope milte rahe Indore mein. See ya :)
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text: Also, your face resembles a cartoon character :p
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
Hi Mudreka,
Kaafi important part hai tu college ka. Baaki sab to theek hai par you were always a very good friend. Maza to aaya tha tere saath. Yaad hai apan ne tere roommate ko room se hata diya tha and pata nai kitne logo ka chutiya kaata hai saath mein. we were good partners in fraud :)
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
Nacchi,
I may have been harsh to you a lot of times but that is just because I care a lot for you. You just mean so much to me that the thought of something bad happening to you scares me. 
The time we spent in the first year was magical, you have so much energy and a super fresh way of looking at things. You can make things psychedelic just by talking about it.  I loved that time so much. But don‚Äôt you worry about that chodu. Even if we lose contact in the future, remember I'll just be one ring away. I'll always welcome you with open arms. 
I don‚Äôt know where you will be but I wish you all the luck I have for your future endeavors.
Love you so much, weirdo. 
PS: I understand üñ§
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
The number of "EXACTLYYYY" moments we shared are countless, atleast last mein saath mein nashe ho gaye jiske plans banae the, aur bhi "on the list" chize karenge jab bhi milengeüíô
PS: Is baar atleast same city ka to adress daal denaüòÖ

Par obviously kaafi badal gaya vo after some good memories. Noida ki graaaand partyy, apni Bithoor vaali cycling trip, thodi bohot random group treats. text:
Lol pata nai kitne time tak tera number mere laptop ka password raha tha xD. Drams mein mile the apan pehli baar and fir drams ki bitching karte karte pata nai kab itne close ho gaye. Kya pagal pantiyaan ki hai saath mein, tere fb se random posts, esc ke exam ke pehle movies, cc mein kisika naaam likhna mere haath pe(wink), kaafi maza aaya. Ghanto thand mein nightouts maare hai saath mein yaar kaise itna enthu tha, apni antaragni epic thi. Apni Delhi trip yaad hai kaise bani thi lol. Train chalne ke baad tum logo ne decide kiya ki chalte hai. Best memory to Sikkim trip hi hai, Ladha ke maze lene mein alag hi baat hai. Recreate karna hai vo trips. 
Bhulna mat tu, chahe to mera number rakhle passwordüò°
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
Hello "summers best friend,"

What if I told you that sometimes gems are just served on a silver platter? Won't believe it right?, I have proof of it in the room next door (yes, I am talking about you, smarty). 

I've never in my entire life met such a hardworking person as you. You never tried to bullshit your way through stuff, be it useless mso chapter or shitty placement companies, and this is just the tip of the iceberg. You deserve great success in your life. 

I don't know how you patiently heard all of my rants, and every time, you calmed me down. You were my savior living next to me. I remember we met through Avani in the first year, but the main bonding started in our second year. I'll miss randomly going to liquid and ordering three huge tiramisus (Man, those were delicious). I may have progressed in my second year, but you are the reason I could do that. You always motivated me to study. I could just drop into your room anytime and come back with all of the stress gone. I saw you vibing with your courses so dedicatedly that I tried to do that myself. So yeah, thanks for that.

You are like a sister to me, and I will miss you so much. Don't you dare forget me after going to Stanford. 
Lots of love üíô
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text: Thanks for being in IITK for our second year summers, kaafi maza aaya. Tu nai hota to eco ki class mein bohot bore hota. Tab hi apni bonding acchi hui thi. I hope apan touch mein rahe, kaafi sensible hai tu and stay this. :)

text: The girl I thought won't talk to any living personality turned out to be very cool to hang out with.  Forever lover <3. Maze karna MIT mein, bade log :p
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:
The girl I thought won't talk to any living personality turned out to be very cool to hang out with.  You were just one door away or one text away. I have insane countless memories of you.  I remember sometimes you were very easily able to guess my mood and came to check if I was okay, that felt super special. You remember in the first year, I knew you were chaapu so I sat next to you in exams to copy from your sheet but couldn‚Äôt understand much, thanks to your "awesome" handwriting :), then I asked you directly and you said, "Umm, I don‚Äôt cheat ". I admired you so much because unlike me, you had principles. 

You remember Antaragni and birthdays vaala time third-year mein, Apan chaaro ka best time lagta hai mujhe vo, also do you remember Diwali mela, trampoline kharidne ka mann ho gaya tha almost mera tab. I just loved your Birthday gift, kitna sahi tha vo. 

I was very sad while leaving you guys but in the end but I am glad that I got to see Swadha drunk üñ§

Forever lover <3. 
Maze karna MIT mein, bade log :p
author: Gunjan  Jalori

text:

Par mujhe bada maza aata tha. Par theek hai, atleast daaru parties mein nasho ke karan awkward nai hota tha. Phookna kam karde nunnu!!.

text:

Aise hi chaapte rehna:)

text:
First of all, thanks for esc101 labs and mth101 tutorials and also 102, actually all of the first year courses. I obviously realised kaafi pehle that you are a chapu. 
I have many amazing memories of you, both of college and lockdown. Our random phone calls and hours of chit chats, design rooftop, your room and my old room, diwali and obviously others. I am gonna miss you for sure. Stay in touch always :) 
Good luck for all your future jobs and whatever you decide to choose. 
Loveüíô

First year mein I never thought ki tu maal ko touch bhi karega but aaj campus ke sabse bade ganjediyon mein see hai tu lol.  Kaafi maza aata hai tujhse baat karne mein especially jab tu high hota hai. Sahi advice hai kisi genius ki, nasha utarna hi nai chahiye.
